items.sentence: Months passed before Tom could get out of bed.
Nothing make me happier than making you happy.
I wasn't able to handle the problem by myself.
Tom has a secret that he's never told anybody.
Did you tell Tom that you knew how to do that?
I don't think Tom needs to ask for permission.
Countries fight for GOD: gold, oil, and drugs.
The high wire act sent chills down Tom's back.
Tom's doctor told him to cut down on drinking.
I'm not sure that that's what Tom needs to do.
